scripts.server:check: cd server && cargo check --message-format=json | jq -r 'select(.reason == "compiler-message" and .message.level == "error") | .message.rendered // .message.message' > gen/cargo-check.log
scripts.desktop:check: cd desktop/src-tauri && cargo check --message-format=json | jq -r 'select(.reason == "compiler-message" and .message.level == "error") | .message.rendered // .message.message' > gen/cargo-check.log
scripts.dev: echo "Running all components in dev mode is not supported yet. Run each component separately."
